attributes.action: give off duty soldiers in the uk sidearms to protect themselfs from attack by fanatical muslim attack
attributes.additional_details:
THE TIME HAS COME FOR ALL MEMBERS OF OUR ARMED FORCES TO CARRY SIDE ARMS WHEN ON BASE OR WHEN THEY ARE IN FULL UNIFORM ANYWHERE THEY TRAVEL,THESE BRAVE PEOPLE DESERVE OUR FULL SUPPORT AND PROTECTION
THEY GO TO FOREIGN LANDS TO FIGHT FOR THIS GOVERNMENT SO THE GOVERNMENT MUST MAKE SURE THEY ARE SAFE WHEN ON HOME SOIL
WHAT HAPPENED TO DRUMMER LEE RIGBY MUST NEVER EVER HAPPEN AGAIN IN THIS COUNTRY
AND WHEN ARMED GIVE THEM THE RIGHT TO DEFEND THEMSELVES WITH DEADLY FORCE
